workExperience.title: Front-end Javascript Developer
body: Played a major role in transitioning to TypeScript and building a new SPA using React and reusable React components
Wrote the JavaScript client library for Seats.io rest API and tests in Jest, automated tests and releases with Travis CI and npm
Brainstormed and implemented new features based on wire-frames, discussed progress, UI/UX and customer feedback during daily product meetings
Maintained and refactored code, fixed bugs and reviewed code, implemented ESLint rules for better code quality and consistent style across different projects

workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
body: Streamlined the process of creating “Room Condition Reports” by developing a responsive CRUD web app using LAMP Stack
Received Distinguished Service Award for my contribution to the Maryville College Community
